mapper.insert: insert into hero_venders (vender_name, vender_code, vender_reg_num, vender_email, vender_phone) values (#{name}, 'VE' || to_char(sysdate, 'yy')|| lpad(HERO_VENDER_seq.nextval,4,0), #{regNum}, #{mail}, #{phone})
mapper.select: select vender_code as code from hero_venders where vender_reg_num = #{value}
